module_mode.label: Module Mode
module_mode.comment: Sets the plugin into a specific mode causing test or production merchant settings to be used along with the respective Docdata environment.

webmenu_active.label: Web menu type
webmenu_active.comment: Showing the Webmenu leaves the choice of payment method up to be decided in the Docdata Webmenu. The other choice means customers get to choose in the checkout process, but they may always switch method once they're in the Docdata Webmenu.

webmenu_css_id.label: Web menu CSS profile
webmenu_css_id.comment: CSS profile that will be used to display the WebMenu page

docdata_payment_title.label: Docdata payment method title
docdata_payment_title.comment: When the setting 'Web menu type' has the value 'Display the payment menu' the checkout will show this generic payment method. This title is the display name.

confidence_level.label: Confidence level
confidence_level.comment: Determines when the order is seen as paid. On 'Authorization' the order will be set to paid on an authorized payment. Set on 'Capture' to only set order to paid when all money transfers are fully completed.

mail_confirmation_on_paid.label: Send order confirmation on Paid status
mail_confirmation_on_paid.comment: If yes the system will only send an order confirmation message once an order is set to paid. If no the system will send an order confirmation once an order is created.

production_username.label: Merchant Username
production_username.comment: Username for your Docdata merchant <u>production</u> account login.

production_password.label: Merchant Password
production_password.comment: Password for your Docdata merchant <u>production</u> account login.

test_username.label: Merchant Test Username
test_username.comment: Username for your Docdata merchant <u>test</u> account login.

test_password.label: Merchant Test Password
test_password.comment: Password for your Docdata merchant <u>test</u> account login.

profile.label: Payment profile
profile.comment: Profile that is used to select the payment methods that can be used to pay this order.

number_of_days_to_pay.label: Number of days to pay
number_of_days_to_pay.comment: Number of days the customer has to perform a payment.

exhortation_period1_number_days.label: Days Exhortation 1
exhortation_period1_number_days.comment: Number of days before the first payment reminder is sent.

exhortation_period1_profile.label: Profile Exhortation 1
exhortation_period1_profile.comment: Profile that is used for the reminder of exhortation period 1.

exhortation_period2_number_days.label: Days Exhortation 2
exhortation_period2_number_days.comment: Number of days before the second payment reminder is sent.

exhortation_period2_profile.label: Profile Exhortation 2
exhortation_period2_profile.comment: Profile that is used for the reminder of exhortation period 2.

new.label: New order status
new.comment: Determines a custom status to be used for a new order. Default use is 'pending'.

pending_payment.label: Pending payment status
pending_payment.comment: Determines a custom status to be used for an order that has selected a payment method but is not yet (fully) paid. Default use is 'pending payment'.

pending_refund.label: Pending refund status
pending_refund.comment: Determines a custom status to be used for an order for which a refund has been requested but not yet (fully) refunded. Default use is 'pending payment'.

paid.label: Paid status
paid.comment: Determines a custom status to be used for a paid order. Default use is 'payment review'.

refunded.label: Refunded status
refunded.comment: Determines a custom status to be used for a refunded order. Default use is 'payment review'.

charged_back.label: Charged back status
charged_back.comment: Used when a payment is charged back by the financial institution. Default use is 'payment review'.

canceled.label: Canceled status
canceled.comment: Determines a custom status to be used for a canceled order. Default use is 'canceled'.

on_hold.label: On hold status
on_hold.comment: Used as an error status. When manual action is required this status is used. For example when Docdata updates are inconsistent with what Magento expects.

title.label: Title
title.comment: Used on the front-end as the name of the method.

displayfields.label: Display Checkout fields
displayfields.comment: When set to No the fields phonenumber/street/housenr/housenr addition won't be shown by default.

command.label: Payment method name
command.comment: As specified in the docdata backend.

extra_costs.label: Added costs
extra_costs.comment: Amount to be added to each order for using Afterpay

sort_order.label: Sort order
sort_order.comment: Sort order for the onepage checkout payment method screen.
